statement.p: Out of the last 45 days, it rained 9 days. What percent of these days did it rain?

solution.p: We recall that a percent is part/whole scaled by 100. Here we have \displaystyle\frac{{9}}{{45}}={0.2}. We convert this to a percent by \displaystyle{100}\cdot{0.2}={20} . Lastly we round to two decimal places. The rounded percent is 20 .
